character.statement: I need to get in there!
Who are you?
You look nervous.
What can I do?
You'll never run from us now.
My blimp!
Oh and by the way, he was right about you being a twerp. I'll never forget the day you got me voted off.
After all these years, the carnival has finally come back to town! I can't wait!
Opening night of the carnival. How exciting. It's in all the papers!
Little Junior here loves his ice cream. I just hope he can keep it down when he hits the rides.
Get your own.

All these people are waiting for the carnival to open, but I don't think it's going to be ready in time.

They'll never find me here.
AHH! You little twerp!
Oh, really. *starts flying your blimp*

WHAT?

I've got a lot of badges for a reason, Mr. Gabe.
